resources.string: Phone must be connected to WLAN network.
The phone needs to be connected to a WLAN network

Your device must be connected to a WLAN network.
If you use a metered or paid WLAN connection, you may be charged for the data usage.

For more info, check with your Internet service provider.
Indicates that WLAN is ready, but the phone must be connected to a charger and the battery must be 100% charged.
Connect to a WLAN network to start the contribution.
